name: Scrap: Test Area
description:
PC Version is currently only Oculus PCVR ready

Scrap is an upcoming multiplayer shooter designed ground-up for the Oculus Quest, though will be released on Oculus PC store as well. The game is focused on physics-driven gunfights, taking advanatge of the interactive and immersive nature of VR.

We are currently just testing our different features and mechanics and would love to get everyones feedback to help us create the ulimate VR shooter. The first test is focused on our weapon handling, recoil and two handed mechanics. In the area you'll find 5 weapons to play with and 4 mini-games to test them out on.

If you like to keep up to date with development then please join our Discord, or if you just want to leave feedback please leave it on here or SideQuest! https://discord.gg/srRWEYy

Happy shootin.
